title: The User's Voice
subtitle: Input and String Operations
hints: Use Console.ReadLine() to get string input from the user
Convert string to int with int.Parse(stringValue) or Convert.ToInt32(stringValue)
Use .ToUpper() method to convert a string to uppercase
Use .Length property to get the number of characters in a string
Use string interpolation $"..." for formatted output

validationTests.description: Must convert strings to numbers using Parse or Convert

learningObjectives: Convert strings to integers using int.Parse()
Use string methods like ToUpper() and ToLower()
